WorkItem.Description: As title states missing buff for set bonus for the 25 man version on the new trinkets which drop off of Onyxia (Shiny Shard of the Scale and Shiny Shard of the Flame).
WorkItem.Summary: [Buffs] Missing Shiny Shard of the Gods 2/2 Set bonus

Comments.Message: That Set Bonus *is* modeled inside Rawr, however whatever particular model you are using (you neglected to mention which) probably doesn't have the effects relevant.

I am using the latest version 2.2.24 and also viewed the latest source code 37868 and under Rawr.Base, Buff.cs this set bonus *is* missing.  What is there is the 10 man verison "Purified Shard of the Gods 2 Piece Bonus (10 man version".  However the set bonus (Shiny Shard of the Gods) for the 25-man version of the 2 trinkets named above *is not* modeled inside.

Here is the listed set bonus for the 25-man version via wowhead:
Increases spell power by 250.
Cauterizing Heal: Heals for 2530 to 3092.
Searing Flame: Causes 3192 Fire damage over 12 sec.

Read on EJ from testing that the internal CD is 45sec.
